channel.title: RARE SOUL Productions Podcast
channel.description:
Rare Soul Productions brings you music from the type of artist rarely found on popular radio today; musicians, producers, and vocalists who create music which speaks from and to the soul, regardless of genre. With events throughout Chicago as well as a residency in St Louis, we seek to bring soul to the masses in a sonically superior and sophisticated environment. Have a listen...
raresoulproductions.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Music that speaks from and to the soul...
channel.itunes:author: Anika Tené
channel.itunes:summary:
Rare Soul Productions brings you music from the type of artist rarely found on popular radio today; musicians, producers, and vocalists who create music which speaks from and to the soul, regardless of genre. With events throughout Chicago as well as a residency in St Louis, we seek to bring soul to the masses in a sonically superior and sophisticated environment. Have a listen...
raresoulproductions.com

item.title: Episode 30: Gifts
item.description:
It's my birthday! For the occassion, I'm decided to change things up a bit, and give out my own presents ;-) I've wrapped up some of my favorite tunes I've been listening to for the past couple of months into a tidy little package that comes in just under an hour. Enjoy...

 

Tracklisting:

  1. Slippin' - Quadron
  2. Limbo - Kimbra
  3. Magdalena - Quantic & Alice Russell With The Combo Barbaro
  4. The Love Cats - Kinny
  5. Sign Language feat. Aloe Blacc - Quakers
  6. Stay The Same (Mark Pritchard Remix) - Bonobo
  7. Retroviser - Ceu
  8. Seasons - Thundercat
  9. Move Love (feat. KING) - Robert Glasper, Wes King & King
  10. Painted On Canvas - Gregory Porter
  11. Tell Me Now - Marc Mac
  12. Back To Back (fan exclusive mix) - Sola Rosa
  13. When I'm In Awe feat. Gonjasufi - The Gaslamp Killer
  14. Moon Goddess  - Jonti
  15. Sinking - Part-Time Heroes
  16. Got 2 Make It (Dub) - Moodymann

Go to raresoulproductions.com to keep up with all RARE SOUL Productions events.

Slippin' - Quadron Limbo - Kimbra Magdalena - Quantic & Alice Russell With The Combo Barbaro The Love Cats - Kinny Sign Language feat. item.title: Episode 29: Singers of Song... Men
item.description:
Now it's time for the poetry and vocal stylings of some of the greatest male vocalists, both past and present. From Fela to Michael, Bill to Marvin, they all have a story to tell...

Tracklisting:

  1. O D O O (Edit) - Fela Kuti
  2. Tive Razao - Seu Jorge
  3. Stepping Razor - Peter Tosh
  4. MAking Sense of It - Omar
  5. It's Good for the Soul Pt 1 - Luther
  6. The Last Time - Gnarls Barkley
  7. Only You - Teddy Pendergrass
  8. Love 2 the 9's - Prince & The New Power Generation
  9. Resolution - José James
  10. Magic Cup - Gregory Porter
  11. Let's Face the Music and Dance - Nat "King" Cole
  12. We're Almost There - Michael Jackson
  13. Do It Good - Bill Withers
  14. That's The Way Love Is - Marvin Gaye
  15. Holding Back The Years (12" Extended Mix) - Simply Red

Go to raresoulproductions.com for information on all future RARE SOUL Productions events.

item.title: Episode 28: Singers of Song... Women
item.description:
This episode I'm paying respect to some of the women in the music industry, both past and present, who demonstrate unparalleled skill using the first musical instrument, the voice. From Grace Jones to Teena Marie, they're all just singers of songs...

Tracklisting:

  1. Feel Up (12") - Grace Jones
  2. Sun Moon Child - Imani Uzuri
  3. BaBopBye Ya - Janelle Monáe
  4. My Same (Garbs Remix) - Adele
  5. At Midnight (My Love Will Lift You Up) - Rufus & Chaka Khan
  6. Talk to Me - Jill Scott
  7. Thank Heaven 4 You - Esthero
  8. Samba Em Preludio - Esperanza Spalding
  9. Age - Lianne La Havas
  10. Save Me - Aretha Franklin
  11. The Spirit's In It - Patti LaBelle
  12. Settle for My Love - Patrice Rushen
  13. Respect - Rotary Connection
  14. I Need Your Lovin' - Teena Marie

Go to raresoulproductions.com for updates on all RARE SOUL Productions events.

item.title: Episode 27: Breakup to Makeup Pt. 2
item.description:
The second half of this 2 hour podcast deals with the happier, yet still very realistic, part of the Breakup to Makeup cycle. As the saying goes, "Let a little love in your heart!"

 

Tracklisting:

  1. Love Is Blindness - Cassandra Wilson
  2. Place In My Heart feat. RYAT - Taylor McFerrin
  3. Thinking About Your Love - Skipworth & Turner
  4. Make That Move - Shalamar
  5. Love Ballad - George Benson
  6. Sow Into You - Róisín Murphy
  7. When She Smiles She Lights The Sky (4 Hero Mix) - Plant Life
  8. I Want U (Yoruba Soul mix) - Floetry
  9. To Know You - Rainer Trüby
  10. Me And You - Gretchen Parlato
  11. The Very Thought Of You - Sarah Vaughan
  12. My Funny Valentine - Miles Davis

Go to raresoulproductions.com to check out all upcoming RARE SOUL Productions Events or click on the Events tab on the Podcast home page.

 

- Anika Tené
item.dc:creator: Anika Tené

item.title: Episode 26: Breakup to Makeup Pt. 1
item.description:
Valentine's Day has always had a very polarizing effect on the population; it separates us into the two categories of the "coupled-up" and "the singles". Well, this 2-part Valentine's Day podcast is for everybody! Anybody who has EVER been in a relationship should be able to relate to the themes covered over the roughly 2 hours of music that follows; from the Breakup to the Makeup, and everywhere in between... So, no talking on these, the songs do all the talking necessary  Enjoy Part 1, Part 2 will be out just in time for the big day.

Tracklisting:

  1. Am I Losing You - Jazzanova
  2. Lonely One - Gregory Porter
  3. Another Again - John Legend
  4. Unbelievable - Heavy
  5. Girlfriend - Michael Jackson
  6. Heart Attack - Raphael Saadiq
  7. You're Not The 1 - Groove Theory
  8. Ice King - Res
  9. He Laughs She Cries - Kaidi Tatham
  10. Never Miss The Water feat. Meshell Ndgeocello - Chaka Khan
  11. She Went Away (Ezel's Remix) - Eric Roberson
  12. Wasting My Love (Full Extended Version) - Heather Johnson
  13. Hole In My Heart - Van Hunt
  14. Chain Of Fools - Aretha Franklin

Go to raresoulproductions.com to check out all upcoming RARE SOUL Productions Events or click on the Events tab on the Podcast home page.

 

- Anika Tené
item.dc:creator: Anika Tené

item.title: Episode 25: How I Feel
item.description:
This episode is a sampling of some of the new artists and releases I've been listening to lately with some oldies but goodies thrown in. Enjoy...

 

Tracklisting:

  1. The Right Message - Marc Mac
  2. Flip Ya Lid - Nightmares On Wax
  3. They Don't Know feat. Freddie McGregor - Miguel Migs
  4. Is It Love? - Thundercat
  5. The Why feat. Nia Andrews - Mark de Clive-Lowe
  6. Average Fruit - Quadron
  7. Whatchalookin@ - J*DaVeY
  8. Vendas Newly Won Dream (Bonus Track) - Jonti
  9. Distortions - Martyn
  10. How I Feel - ISoul8
  11. Sandstorms - Carl Craig
  12. Your Sex (Art Department's Shades Of Gotica Remix) - dOP

Go to raresoulproductions.com to stay up-to-date with all RARE SOUL Productions events.

item.title: Episode 24: Looking Back... 2011
item.description:
This episode is a musical tribute to some of the wonderful talents the music industry lost to time and tragedy in 2011. Through their music, they will forever live on!

Tracklisting:

  1. We're Getting Stronger (Walter Gibbons Mix) - Loleatta Holloway
  2. Clouds (written by N. Ashford/V. Simpson) - Chaka Khan
  3. Don't Blow A Good Thing (12" Vocal Mix) - Vesta Williams
  4. Alien (Hold On To Your Dreams) - Gil Scott-Heron & Brian Jackson
  5. Hot Stepper (prod. by Philip "Fatis" Burrell  - Ini Kamoze
  6. Police Officer - Smiley Culture
  7. A Ta Façon - DJ Mehdi
  8. Valerie - Mark Ronson Feat. Amy Winehouse
  9. Ripped Off - Loleatta Holloway
  10. Anything Is Possible (ft Vinia Mojica) - DJ Mehdi
  11. It Seems To Hang On (Tommy Musto Re-Touch) - Ashford & Simpson
  12. Sodade - Cesaria Evora

Go to raresoulproductions.com to stay up to date on all RARE SOUL Productions events in the coming year!

item.title: Episode 23: dance, Dance, DANCE!
item.description:
For those nights, or even days, when you're just looking for an excuse to put your dancing feet to work, here you go...

 

Tracklisting: 

  1. Nights (Feel Like Getting Down) - Billy Ocean
  2. Get Down Friday Night - Fantastic Aleems
  3. The Magnificent Dance (12") - The Clash
  4. Everybody - Jacksons
  5. Everybody Dance - Bumblebee Unlimited
  6. Dance Dance Dance (12") - Chic
  7. Dance Wit Me - Rufus & Chaka Khan
  8. Everybody Get Down - Mouzon's Electric Band
  9. Dance N' Sing N' - L.T.D.
  10. Rock Creek Park - The Blackbyrds
  11. Dance And Shake Your Tambourine - The Universal Robot Band

Go to raresoulproductions.com for all event information
item.dc:creator: Anika Tené

item.title: Episode 22: Seasons of the Mist
item.description:
Life folows seasons just as the earth does. There are beginnings, middles, and we are forever putting off the end. Welcome to the Seasons of the Mist...

Tracklisting:

  1. Altered Natives - Good Evening Ladies & Gentlemen, We Are Eventide Astral
  2. Ben Westbeech - Something For The Weekend - Part 1 (Gerry Read Remix)
  3. Sicania Soul - Life Is A Tree (Truby Trio Treatment)
  4. Colman Brothers - Another Brother (Remix)
  5. Swell Session - Music In Her eyes
  6. C.9ine - Chasing (Original Mix)
  7. John Robinson - The Genesis (produced by Build An Ark & Carlos Nino)
  8. Asa - Be My Man
  9. Thundercat - Daylight
  10. Dezaray Dawn - Deep Waters
  11. Emily King - Down
  12. Sarah White - Limitless
  13. James Blake - I Mind

Go to raresoulproductions.com for all event information.

item.title: Episode 21: FALLin'
item.description:
After my 3 week hiatus from the podcast, I decided to explore what it's like during that "first flush" What is it really like to fall?

 

Tracklisting:

  1. Lost & Found (Inner Fusion) - Anthony Nicholson
  2. Love Endeavor (Maurice Fulton remix) - Alice Smith
  3. Take It Out - Saturn Never Sleeps
  4. Let Your Feelings Go - Ben Westbeech
  5. The First Taste - Fiona Apple
  6. Poet - Cassandra Wilson
  7. Gimme That Kinda - Electric Wire Hustle
  8. I'd Rather Be With You - Bootsy Collins
  9. You're So Good To Me - Curtis Mayfield
  10. My Love Is Free (12" Version) - Double Exposure
  11. All day, All night - Prince

Go to raresoulproductions.com for all event info, photos, and blog entries.

item.title: Episode 20: Hip Hop Lives!
item.description:
No talking on this one, just good 'ole-fashioned hip hop, or rap music as the kid's used to say. ;-) Some people say rap music lost it's soul, but it really just went underground...

Tracklisting:

  1. Won't Trade - Q-Tip
  2. Celebortee ft. Cy Yung - The Primeridian
  3. Take a Minute (J.Period Fela Remix) - J.Period & K'NAAN
  4. I Gotcha - Lupe Fiasco
  5. The U.N. Plan - Shafiq Husayn
  6. Mortal Thought - KRS-One
  7. Green Light: Now Begin - Blackalicious
  8. Revolution World Crazy - Panacea
  9. Wake Up, It's Africa Calling (Youssou Remix) - Nas
  10. Fitness f/ Homeboy Sandman - J-Live
  11. After The Worries - Platinum Pied Pipers
  12. Ms. Fat Booty, No Love (LMNtal REMIX) - Mos Def, Little Dragon, LMNtal
  13. 24k Rap (Featuring Havoc Of Mobb Depp & Raekwon) - J Dilla
  14. We Are - Freestyle Fellowship
  15. Meiso (4 Hero Vocal mix) - DJ Krush feat. Black Thought
  16. Soul (Divine Intervention) - Soul Evidence
  17. The Author (produced by Flying Lotus) - John Robinson
  18. Keep On (feat. yU) - DTMD

Visit raresoulproductions.com for info on upcoming RARE SOUL Productions events.

item.title: Episode 19: My Love Supreme Pt.2 - From Pursuance to Psalm
item.description:
This week's episode continues where the last one left off. From Pursuance to Psalm includes music from legends John Coltrane, Abbey Lincoln, Nina Simone, Lou Rawls, and even the Beatles!

Tracklisting:

  1. Pursuance - John Coltrane
  2. Dead End Street - Lou Rawls
  3. I Must Have That Man - Abbey Lincoln
  4. I Loves You, Porgy - Nina Simone
  5. The Dreamer - José James
  6. Blue Light - Prince & The New Power Generation
  7. Tell Me Something Good - Rufus & Chaka Khan
  8. Adventures In Paradise - Minnie Riperton
  9. Signed, Sealed, Delivered, I'm Yours - Stevie Wonder
  10. Wonderful World - Sam Cooke
  11. I Want You (She's So Heavy) - The Beatles
  12. Psalm - John Coltrane

Go to raresoulproductions.com for information on RARE SOUL Productions events.

item.title: Episode 18: My Love Supreme Pt.1 - Acknowledgement to Resolution
item.description:
This 2-part podcast is inspired and encompassed by the four-part suite which marks the beginning of my love affair with music, A Love Supreme by John Coltrane. Each and every track and artist epitomizes the greatest gifts music has to offer; honesty, talent, and pure emotional expression. Enjoy...

Tracklisting:

  1. Acknowledgement - John Coltrane
  2. I Will Be Here For You - Al Jarreau
  3. You Are My Heaven - Roberta Flack with Donny Hathaway
  4. I Can't Help It - Michael Jackson
  5. Rock Steady (Alternate Mix) - Aretha Franklin
  6. I Want You (Vocal) - Marvin Gaye
  7. You Move Me - Cassandra Wilson
  8. Smooth - D'Angelo
  9. If You Want Me To Stay - Sly & The Family Stone
  10. Me and Mrs. Jones - Billy Paul
  11. Speak Low - Billie Holiday
  12. Bhg - Roy Hargrove
  13. Resolution - John Coltrane

Go to raresoulproductions.com for event information.
item.dc:creator: Anika Tené

item.title: Episode 17: Soul School
item.description:
Today's episode is a study of soul across old and new, exploring genre-bending sounds, and from around the globe.

Tracklisting:

  1. Black Cow feat. Phonte and Sy Smith - Zo!
  2. Corners - Gil Scott-Heron & Brian Jackson
  3. Love's So Far Away - Donald Byrd
  4. Imaginist - Space Invadas

  8. Rockin' You Eternally - Jazzanova, Leon Ware & Dwele
  9. Running In The Streets (Djinji Brown rmx) - Kahil El'Zabar
  10. Everything is Alright feat. Monday Michiru - Yellowtail
  11. The Chief (PTH Interpol Challenges Mix) - Colman Brothers
  12. Feral - Radiohead
  13. Missing You - Larry Heard

item.title: Episode 16: Roller Boogie
item.description:
This episode is for anybody who went to a birthday party, family reunion, or school field trip at the neighborhood roller rink... as well as those who wish they had! Enjoy,

Tracklisting:

  1. Walkin' on Sunshine - Rockers Revenge
  2. Atmosphere Strut - Cloud One
  3. I Wanna Be With You - Coffee
  4. Funky Nassau, Pt. 2 - The Beginning of the End
  5. The Glow of Love - Change
  6. Way Back When - Brenda Russell
  7. Got To Give It Up (Part 1) - Marvin Gaye
  8. Take That To The Bank - Shalamar
  9. The Screams Of Passion - Family
  10. Four Play - Fred Wesley & The Horny Horns
  11. Riding High - Faze-O
  12. I Can't Stand The Rain - Ann Peebles

Go to www.raresoulproductions.com for updates on all RARE SOUL Productions events.

item.title: Episode 15: Make It Funky!
item.description:
For this one I decided to go back to my funky roots, then mix in a few blazing hot, new tracks from the finest of the latest generation of funk all stars! It's summer-time people, let's "Make It Funky"...

 

Tracklisting:

  1. Hollywood Squares - Bootsy Collins
  2. Get It Up - The Time
  3. Daylight - Thundercat
  4. Time for Pleasure -  L.T.D.
  5. Contusion - Stevie Wonder
  6. Viva A Vida Como Se Nao Hauvesse Amanha - Shannon Harris
  7. Mpg - MANUALS
  8. Monday Blues - dego
  9. It's So... (Zed Bias Remix) - Omar & Zed Bias
  10. He Laughs She Cries - Kaidi Tatham
  11. Final Form - Lianne La Havas (Everything Everything Cover)
  12. Stop - Muhsinah
  13. Code - Jose James
  14. The Answer - Raphael Saadiq

Go to raresoulproductions.com for all Event Information.

Please support the artists featured in this podcast by purchasing their music

For this one I decided to go back to my funky roots, then mix in a few blazing hot, new tracks from the finest of the latest generation of funk all stars! It's summer-time people, let's "Make It Funky"...   Tracklisting:
Hollywood Squares - Bootsy Collins Get It Up - The Time Daylight - Thundercat Time for Pleasure -  L.T.D. Contusion - Stevie Wonder Viva A Vida Como Se Nao Hauvesse Amanha - Shannon Harris Mpg - MANUALS Monday Blues - dego It's So... (Zed Bias Remix) - Omar & Zed Bias He Laughs She Cries - Kaidi Tatham Final Form - Lianne La Havas (Everything Everything Cover) Stop - Muhsinah Code - Jose James The Answer - Raphael Saadiq
Go to raresoulproductions.com for all Event Information. Please support the artists featured in this podcast by purchasing their music

item.title: Episode 14/Resident Series: Sean Alvarez - CITY BEAT Sessions 5/26/11
item.description:
With regular DJ stints as a CITY BEAT Sessions resident at Crocodile Lounge, the We Love Soul events at both Darkroom and the Exchange, as well as the Past Present Future internet radio show and podcast, Sean Alvarez is known as a purveyor of new music all over Chicago. Today's entry in the RARE SOUL Productions Resident series was recorded live during Sean's set from the May 25, 2011 City Beat Sessions at Crocodile Lounge. Enjoy...

CITY BEAT Sessions takes place every 2nd and 4th Thursday in the Crocodile Lounge Bassment, 1540 N. Milwaukee Ave, Chicago, Il. The next Session is Thursday July 28, 2011.

No Tracklisting

www.djseanalvarez.com

seanalvarez.podomatic.com

welovesoul.blogspot.com

LISTEN:U.P!/City Beat

www.facebook.com/groups/listenupfam

item.title: Episode 13: I Am, We Are...
item.description:
I've got lots of goodies for your listening pleasure this episode, some old but much more are new. I've also got plenty of Chicago talent for you; starting out with one of Herbie Hancock's earlier works which has been sampled by many, as well as entries from duo Monologic and a track from the forthcoming album, "Year of the Rebel" from producer Anthony Nicholson. Any 4hero fans are also going to recognize the broken beat sounds of Dego who has a brand new solo album. Please support artistry in music, check the tracklisting, and buy anything that catches your ear!

Tracklisting:

  1. Oliloqui Valley - Herbie Hancock
  2. Daluma (Original Mix) - Basement Jaxx
  3. Zodiac Shift (Sonnymoon Remix) - Flying Lotus
  4. Far Closer - Andreya Triana
  5. No Worries feat. Steve Spacek - Platinum Pied Pipers
  6. Just Don't - Raphael Saadiq feat. Yukimi Nagano
  7. Dance Or Die - Janelle Monáe
  8. Angles - Monologic
  9. Broken Vibes feat. Vincent Parker (Isoul8 Edit) - Taylor McFerrin
  10. Right from Wrong feat. Tosin Tao - dego
  11. Children Speak feat. William Kurk - Anthony Nicholson
  12. I Am Africa (An Afflickted Soul Vox Mix) - Mikki Afflick feat. Mona Bode

Go to raresoulproductions.com for updates on all events

- Anika Tené
item.dc:creator: Anika Tené

item.title: Episode 12: Je t'Adore
item.description:
The 12th episode is all about love; the heady rush of feelings when you're falling, the confusion of trying to figure out if it's the real deal, and the joy of finding that perfect match. Here's a little bit of summer loving...

Tracklisting:

  1. Do U Luv Me - Lil' Louis
  2. Right Where You Are (Extended Version) - Amp Fiddler
  3. Look Inside (Izmabad Remix) - 4hero
  4. Closer 2 U (Original Mix) - Roy Davis Jr.
  5. I'm Feelin You (Henrik Schwarz Remix) - Omar ft. Stevie Wonder
  6. Come Go With Me - Jimmy Abney
  7. Good Morning Feat. Monique Bingham (Vocal Mix) - Karizma
  8. Get Closer (Marathon Man Remix) - Ben Westbeech
  9. I'll Wait feat. Lenny Hamilton (Ian Friday Tea Party Mix) - Dalminjo
  10. Real Thing (Main Mix) - Melchyor A & MJ White
  11. Destiny - Erik Rico & Marc Mac

Visit raresoulproductions.com for information on upcoming events.

- Anika Tené
item.dc:creator: Anika Tené

item.title: Ep. 11: Pure Potential
item.description:
po·ten·tial (n)

1. The inherent ability or capacity for growth, development, or coming into being.

Today's episode examines both our potential, as individuals and as a species, and how that potential translates to action.

Tracklisting:

  1. In Search Of Hope Pt 2 - Kaidi Tatham
  2. The World Is Yours (Deeper Mix) - Kerri Chandler
  3. I Am The Road (Bugz In The Attic Vocal Remix) - Markus Enochson
  4. Boom Clicky Boom Klack (Mr Scruff Vocal Mix) - Jazzanova
  5. Earth Beats (Henrik Schwarz Remix) - Kuniyuki
  6. Look To The Sun - Saul Williams
  7. Emotions (Waajeed Remix) - Ty
  8. People's Potential (Original Mix) - Floating Points
  9. Singer Of Songs (The Vinyl Ears Mix) - Irfan Rainy & Rex Leon feat. Vaceo
  10. Warrior - José James
  11. Black Man - Stevie Wonder

Visit raresoulproductions.com for all event information

item.title: Episode 10: Tales of Humanity
item.description:
Friday May 27, 2011, Chicago-born Gil Scott-Heron, poet, musical innovator, author, and activist died at the age of 62. I had already nearly completed this episode, but considering the fact that the underlying theme was storytelling in music, it seemed only fitting to dedicate this episode to one of the great storytellers of both the 20th and 21st centuries. This one's for you Gil...

  1. Get A Hold - A Tribe Called Quest
  2. Perception - Electric Wire Hustle
  3. Tell Me A Tale - Michael Kiwanuka
  4. 50 Ways To Leave Your Lover ft. Rogier - Platinum Pied Pipers
  5. It's Too Late To Change The Time  - The Jackson 5
  6. (Don't Worry) If There's a Hell Below We're All Going to Go - Curtis Mayfield
  7. Being A Girl - Van Hunt
  8. Me - Erykah Badu
  9. Human Behaviour - Björk
  10. Harlem (Eamon Harkin Edit) - Bill Withers
  11. Got My Dream (Fela Tribute) - J.Period & K'NAAN
  12. Haulin' (Instrumental) - Freddie Perren
  13. Design A Nation - Donald Byrd
  14. Corners - Gil Scott-Heron & Brian Jackson

Check out event listings at raresoulproductions.com

This one's for you Gil...

item.title: Episode 9: Encounters With A Heavenly Body
item.description:
Feeling a little spacey today, so here are a few selections from our little galaxy and beyond...

Tracklisting:

  1. I Am the Black Gold of the Sun - Rotary Connection
  2. Sunspots - 4Hero
  3. Star *69 (PS With Love) (Featuring Bilal) - Common
  4. Sun, Moon, Stars - Mos Def
  5. Stardust & Passion - Richie Havens
  6. Corner Of The Earth - Jamiroquai

  8. New Moon (Yoruba Soul Dub) - Gabriele Poso
  9. Sun Will Shine (feat. Bridgette Amofah) - Part Time Heroes

item.title: Episode 8: Mama Said... A Mother's Day Tribute
item.description:
This episode is dedicated to the incredible, lovely, and vibrant woman known as my mother, as well as mother's all around the world. I've compiled a selection of songs that I heard in my childhood home as well as some tunes I feel epitomize the valuable lessons I learned while observing this miraculous lady navigate through the challenges and pitfalls of the world... and always with a smile "Sunny, one so true, I love you"

raresoulproductions.com

Tracklisting:

  1. Mama Used To Say (12") - Junior
  2. Boogie Down - Al Jarreau
  3. Enjoy Yourself - The Jacksons
  4. Respect - Aretha Franklin
  5. Simple Things - Minnie Riperton
  6. Right Here, Right Now - Cassandra Wilson
  7. Sunny - Marvin Gaye
  8. 20 Feet Tall - Erykah Badu
  9. Everybody Got Their Something - Nikka Costa
  10. Earn My Affections - Amel Larrieux
  11. Live In The Light - Fertile Ground
  12. Reach Out I'll Be There - Four Tops
  13. Mother Of The Future - Norman Connors
  14. Freedom Day - Abbey Lincoln & Max Roach
  15. Ya Mama - The Pharcyde

item.title: Episode 7 / Resident Series: Jevon Jackson - ReDefinition
item.description:
This episode we're introducing the Rare Soul Productions Resident Series and our inaugral guest mix is from ROCKERS & City Beat  resident Jevon Jackson. Though a veteran of the house music scene in Chicago and around the world, Jevon Jackson will never rest on his laurels or be satisfied with glories obtained in a bygone era. Hence: ReDefiniton...

Tracklisting

  1. This City Never Sleeps - Eurythmics
  2. The Deejay's an Alien Part II (Rocco Spoken Dub) - David Harness & Roland Cark
  3. Touch Of Soul (Milton Jackson Remix) - Dominic Martin
  4. Manifesto (AYBEE's Blak Space Federation Slap) - Ron Trent
  5. Got a Hold on Your Soul (Original Mix) - Jimpster
  6. Check The Boogie (Soul Minority Remix) - Pablo Fierro
  7. Because Of You (Yoruba Soul Mix) - Michelle Amador
  8. FR33Z EP (Oblivion (Dixon Edit)) - I:Cube
  9. Beyond The Clouds - Mr. Fingers
  10. Momma's Groove (Nomumbah's  Remix) - Osunlade

Resident Advisor Profile:

www.residentadvisor.net/dj/jevonjackson

Blog:

thenewconnoisseur.wordpress.com/

raresoulproductions.com
item.dc:creator: Anika Tené

item.title: Episode 6: ELEVATION
item.description:
On April 15, 2011, CoLab (an inter-disciplinary arts cooperative), and Zhou B Art Center put on an extraordinary evening of experimentation, elegance, excitement, energy and “ELEVATION”! The brainchild of Kahil El’ Zabar, the internationally renowned percussionist and composer, sensational installation artist, Lucy Slivinski, and the stellar fashion designer, Agnieszka Kulon, ELEVATION was a night I was honored to be a part of. This week's podcast features songs from the set I played at this landmark event in Chicago.

-Anika Tené

raresoulproductions.com

Elevation Fan Page:

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Elevation/148673158530147?ref=ts

  1. Storm Music - Gil Scott-Heron
  2. Bad Tune - Earth, Wind & Fire
  3. (Never Been To) California - Jazz Spastiks
  4. Dust (Original Mix) - Recloose, Joe Dukie
  5. I Adore You - Esperanza Spalding
  6. Identity Breaker - J.A.M
  7. A Million Tears - Shuya Okino & Dalmata Feat. Courtney Dennis
  8. Ko Ko - Jerome Sydenham, Dennis Ferrer
  9. Na Oil - Fela's Egypt 80 & Seun Kuti
  10. Nü Soul Makossa Featuring Manu Dibango - Les Nubians
  11. Broadway (Live) - George Benson
  12. Free - James Mason

item.title: Episode 5: Land of The Rising Sun | A Tribute to Japan
item.description:
After playing the CHICAGO's GOT SOUL Benefit for Japan this past Friday with my friend Rich Cole and Beasley Q at Tonic Room, I decided to do this tribute podcast. The tracklisting is a veritable who's-who of Japanese musicians sprinkled with musicians from other walks of life touching on how people deal with adversity. If at all possible, please donate to the Red Cross' relief effort here. Check out the artists and support them as well.

-Anika Tené

  1. Computer Games - Yellow Magic Orchestra
  2. Constant Surprises - Little Dragon
  3. Jazzy Joint - J.A.M Feat. Jose James
  4. When The World Is Running Down (Eli's Edit) - The Police
  5. Arabesque - Jazztronik
  6. Waltz for Goddess - Soil & Pimp Sessions
  7. The Healer - Erykah Badu
  8. Sanctuary - Orange Pekoe
  9. Beautiful Sadness - Shuya Okino & Domu Feat. Carleen Anderson
  10. It's the Way - Root Soul Feat. Vanessa Freeman
  11. Hard Times (Feat. Black Thought) - John Legend & The Roots
  12. Alone in Africa Part 1 (DJ Uchikawa Remix) - Niko De Luka

Go to raresoulproductions.com for Rare Soul Productions event information
item.dc:creator: Anika Tené

item.title: Episode 4: Breath of Life
item.description:
Thank you to everybody who downloaded and listened to the Loleatta Holloway tribute, what a great response! I had to get more bandwidth just to keep up. Today's episode is my homage to spring and new life, even if the weather's proving to be a little reluctant here in Chicago. This a few of the newer acquisitions in my music library, some are new releases, others are just new to me! Enjoy...

  1. Ancestral Song (Osunlade remix) - Kahil El'Zabar
  2. He Loves Me (Main Vocal) - Nick Doe feat Louise Golbey
  3. Lazy Daze  - J*DaVeY
  4. Da Day - Dezaray Dawn
  5. Good Love - Daru & Reggie B
  6. London Girl - The Invisible
  7. Why? - Freestyle Fellowship
  8. No Escape ft. Carlitta Durand & Darien Brockington - The Beast and Nnenna Freelon
  9. Paper Lines - Phonte
  10. Super Sweet (Feat. Fantine) - Space Invadas
  11. The Story - King
  12. Rainwalk - Meagan McNeal
  13. Time Passed Autumn - Apollo Brown
  14. They Don't Want - Electric Wire Hustle
  15. Alone - James Pants

Please visit raresoulproductions.com for information about Rare Soul Productions events and all the new stuff we'll be bringing you this spring and summer.

- Anika Tené
item.dc:creator: Anika Tené

item.title: Episode 3: A Tribute to Loleatta Holloway & Chicago Soul
item.description:
March 21, 2011 Loleatta Holloway died from heart failure at age 64 and the dance music community went into mourning. Today's episode celebrates her legacy as well as the many men and women who helped shape Chicago Soul.

  1. Hit and Run (Walter Gibbons Mix) -Loleatta Holloway
  2. Body Heat - Rufus & Chaka Khan
  3. All Night Thing _ The Invisible Man's Band
  4. Ain't Nothin' Goin' On But The Rent (Larry Levan Club Mix) - Gwen Guthrie
  5. Catch Me on the Rebound - Loleatta Holloway
  6. Stick Together - Minnie Riperton
  7. Shake It Up - The Vibrations
  8. Hard Times - Baby Huey & the Babysitters
  9. I'll Take You There - The Staple Singers
  10. Dreamin' (Carl Paroulo Mix) - Loleatta Holloway

http://thenewconnoissur.wordpress.com for Rare Soul Productions event information.

-Anika Tené
item.dc:creator: Anika Tené

item.title: Episode 2: Dreaming Wide Awake
item.description:
One cold and snowy night in January, I played a couple of tunes with good friend and Silver Room owner, Eric Williams, for a few lost souls looking for some heat at Rodan in Wicker Park. I decided to play a few songs from that set for those of you who didn't or couldn't come out and brave the cold with us!

Track Listing

  1. Give Me Your Love - Curtis Mayfield
  2. Indigo - Imani Uzuri
  3. Again (Scratch 22 remix) - Electric Wire Hustle
  4. She Went Away (Yoruba Soul Mix) - Erro
  5. Go (Chez Damier Classic Mix) - The Urban Cru
  6. Our Time Is Now (IG Culture rmx) - Kahil El'Zabar
  7. I Can't Give You More - Suzy Q
  8. Please Pardon Me (You Remind Me Of A Friend) - Rufus & Chaka Khan
  9. Ladies (Original Mix) - Agent K
  10. Expressions (Jazzman's Project (Apple Jazz Mix)) - Black Jazz
  11. Chameleon (Eleonora Stilnovo Remix) - Dezaray Dawn
  12. Dreams (Original Afronaught Mix) - Alison David

Silver Room

www.thesilverroom.com/

item.title: Rare Soul Productions Podcast: Episode 1
item.description:
Rare Soul brings you music from the kind of artist which is rare in the music industry today; musicians, producers, and vocalists who create music which speaks from and to the soul, regardless of genre.

Track Listing:

  1. Nightclubbing - Grace Jones
  2. Motor Booty Affair - Parliament
  3. Hot Stage Lights - Van Hunt
  4. Acid Queen - Tina Turner
  5. High Steppin' Hip Dressin' Fella - Love Unlimited
  6. Just Friends - Amy Winehouse
  7. Sweet Power (Your Embrace) - James Mason
  8. A Long Walk (A Touch of Jazz Mix) - Jill Scott
  9. Lazer Gunne Funke - Jay Dilla
  10. Star (RP's Club Mix) - Reel People Feat. Tony Momrelle
  11. Young Willing And Able - Minnie Riperton
  12. I'm Still Standing - Omar
item.dc:creator: Anika Tené

Rare Soul brings you music from the kind of artist which is rare in the music industry today; musicians, producers, and vocalists who create music which speaks from and to the soul, regardless of genre.Track Listing:
Nightclubbing - Grace Jones Motor Booty Affair - Parliament Hot Stage Lights - Van Hunt Acid Queen - Tina Turner High Steppin' Hip Dressin' Fella - Love Unlimited Just Friends - Amy Winehouse Sweet Power (Your Embrace) - James Mason A Long Walk (A Touch of Jazz Mix) - Jill Scott Lazer Gunne Funke - Jay Dilla Star (RP's Club Mix) - Reel People Feat. Tony Momrelle Young Willing And Able - Minnie Riperton I'm Still Standing - Omar
